label: User-Story-1
title: Review architect and agent briefs in the Issues-FS UI

properties.i_want: To be able to view, review and approve architect briefs, refactoring plans, and agent-generated documents directly in the Issues-FS UI
properties.so_that: I can review plans without needing to open files in an editor, and can approve/reject/comment on them through the issue tracking workflow
acceptance_criteria: Briefs and plan documents (markdown) render in the UI with full formatting
Can link a brief document to an issue as an attachment or embedded content
Can add review comments and approval status to brief-linked issues
Navigation between related issues and their briefs is seamless
properties.notes: This is critical for the Conductor workflow â€” the human stakeholder needs a way to review agent outputs without switching to file explorers or editors. The refactoring plan at roles/Issues-FS__Dev__Role__Architect/docs/plan__phase-2-refactoring.md is the first real use case.
